1: <pb/><t>Calec vach' lolonel d'a Jehová.</t> <t>Man̈xo jantacoc svach'il co b'itan b'it d'a co Diosal. Smojton val co b'itan d'ay yed' juntzan̈ b'it te vach'.</t>
2: <t>A Jehová sb'oanxi Jerusalén, ol smolb'ejxicot eb' quetisraelal sacleminac yajcanb'ati.</t>
3: <t>A tz'ac'an snivanil sc'ol eb' pitz'anoch cuselal d'a spixan. A' tz'an̈tan syaelal eb' chi'.</t>
4: <t>A' na'annac jantac sb'isul q'uen c'anal sb'onac, yac'annacoch sb'i junjun q'ueen.</t>
5: <t>Yelxo val te nivan yelc'och co Diosal tic, nivan spoder, malaj slajvub'al sjelanil.</t>
6: <t>A' tz'ic'an q'ue vaan eb' anima emnaquil yeq'ui, palta a eb' sc'ulan chucal, tz'ic'chajcanem eb' sic'lab'il yuuj.</t>
7: <t>Co b'itejec Jehová yic scac'an yuj diosal yed' te' arpa sco b'itejec.</t>
8: <t>A' tz'ac'anoch asun d'a satchaan̈, slajvi chi' syac'ancot n̈ab' d'a sat luum tic. A' tz'ac'an q'uib' an̈ an̈c'ultac d'a tzalquixtac.</t>
9: <t>An̈ejton pax a' tz'ac'an svael noc' noc' yed' noc' yunetac joj ayic tz'el yav noc' yuj vejel.</t>
10: <t>A Jehová, max tzalajlaj yed' eb' anima tz'ac'anoch yip noc' chej, ma yipal eb' soldado yipoc sc'ool.</t>
11: <t>Palta stzalaj yed' eb' ay xivc'olal d'ay, aton eb' tz'ac'anoch svach'c'olal yipoc sc'ool.</t>
12: <t>Ex aj Jerusalén, calec vach' lolonel d'a Jehová. Ex aj Sion, co b'itejec co Diosal.</t>
13: <t>A' tz'ac'anoch yip yijchuloc spuertail chon̈ab' Jerusalén, syac'anpax svach'c'olal d'a eb' cuninal.</t>
14: <t>A' tz'ac'an junc'olal d'a yol smacb'en co chon̈ab' tic, syac'anpax b'ud'joc yuj ixim trigo te vach'.</t>
15: <t>A' tz'ac'ancot slolonel d'a sat luum tic, elan̈chamel tz'elc'ochi.</t>
16: <t>A co Diosal tz'ac'ancot q'uen sacb'acom icha yilji sac lana. A' tz'ac'anoch q'uen cheev pococal, icha q'uen tic'aq'uil taan̈ tz'ajcan q'ueen.</t>
17: <t>A' tz'ac'ancot q'uen sacb'at icha q'uen cotac q'ueen. Axo val sical q'ueen, malaj junoc mach stechaj yuuj.</t>
18: <t>Syalanpaxi to tz'ulaxb'at q'ueen, syac'ancot ic', yic sb'ey yalil q'ueen chi'.</t>
19: <t>A slolonel yed' sc'ayb'ub'al, ix yac' cojtaquejel a on̈ israel yin̈tilal on̈ vin̈aj Jacob tic.</t>
20: <t>Man̈ ichocta' ix yutej d'a junocxo nación. Maj yojtaquejel-laj sc'ayb'ub'al co Diosal juntzan̈xo chon̈ab' chi'.</t> <t>Calec vach' lolonel d'a Jehová.</t>
